Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to enhance your daily life or work experience. With its unique features and capabilities, it has proven to be invaluable to many of our satisfied customers. I believe it could significantly benefit you as well. For this exceptional opportunity, I am offering it to you for $180. I trust you will find its value far exceeding this price. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $180. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $180
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
